User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.2; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.2; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

If a text input control is disabled while it has focus, all browser keyboard input stops working until the window is clicked.  keypress events aren't dispatched, menu hotkeys stop working, and so on.

A workaround is to always call blur() on input elements before disabling them.


Reproducible: Always
